column4: I heard a podcast that says that Ubuntu is based on debian unstable and as a result bugs creep into Ubuntu. I am skeptical about this. Anyone able to confirm or deny this? Seems pretty stable to me for a distro supposedly based on deb unstable.
Maybe Ubuntu doesn't match /Debians/ definition of stable, but it is released more often
Oh, stable means not even a caveman can break it. /ducks and hides from the cavemen.
I was thinking the same thing.
